message.body: Any interest in going to the pig roast this year? Its in the beginning of September. It'd be sweet if we can get some goat cheese delivered... If you know what I mean... *wink, wink. Also, 4th of July...?

Yes, lots of interest.
4th of July day I'll be in the city. What about those fireworks??

Which fireworks? The ones I wanted to purchase or the ones the city does? The weekend of the 4th of July like the 5th to 7th Blakslee n Raleigh want to have a little get together on the farm if you're interested?

Ah, my bro is having party that weekend and I already told him I was going.
Yea, the ones you wanted to get. When are you going?
I'd get them whenevs. I'm pretty much at the mercy of whoever's licence is being used since I can't get them myself.
Okay, I have a VA license, so let me know
I'm in Chicago next weekend on a trip for business, however
